document.full_text: chipotle mexican grill inc, which has fired roughly 500 undocumented workers as a result of immigration audits, was sued by a customer who alleged one of its restaurants rejected his mexican passport as proof of age when he tried to buy beer.
document.title: chipotle rejects mexican passport as id: lawsuit
lines_and_colors: chipotle mexican grill inc, which has fired roughly 500 undocumented workers as a result of immigration audits, was sued by a customer who alleged one of its restaurants rejected his mexican passport as proof of age when he tried to buy beer.
